ModMetaData.name: [JDS] Star Wars Phase I Clone Armor
ModMetaData.author: JangoD'soul
ModMetaData.description:
This mod add StarWar:clone war armor set and my second mod other then "Fallout T-45" for A14 . I still don't know how to code that will so if something bug i'll try to fix it
Note:All Phase I armor has same base stat
Features: Standard Phase I Armor - Colored White Sergeant Phase I Armor - Colored Green Lieuteant Phase I Armor - Colored Blue Captain Phase I Armor - Colored Red Commander Phase I Armor -Colored Yellow ARC Phase I Armor Commando Phase I Armor ARF Standard Helmet Special Ops StandardHelmet Standard Pilot Standard Helme Cold Assualt Armor Set
Crafting Requirements: -Craftable -Research Requirements: Fabrication
Phase I Helmet -Crafting Skill: 8 -Steel: x40 -Plasteel: x20 -Component: x4 -Advanced Component: x1
Phase I Armor -Crafting Skill: 8 -Steel: x120 -Plasteel: x50 -Component: x8 -Advanced Component: x1
Credit: dninemfive - For using his .dll Code for the shielding
